en-US.summary: Retrieve the latest info on Stellar Lumens from coinmarketcap.com.
examplePhrases: ask stellar lumen what is the lumen price?
ask Stellar lumen to convert fifty lumens.
en-US.name: Stellar Lumen
en-US.description:
Ask for the current Lumen Price, and retrieve the latest info from coinmarketcap.com.

Lumen price will keep you upto date about your favorite cryptocurrency Stellar Lumens.

To start, just say "Alexa, start Stellar Lumen" or "Alexa, ask Stellar Lumen what is the lumen price?" this defaults to dollars or "Alexa, ask Stellar Lumen what is the lumen price in bitcoin?" to get the current price in bitcoin. You can also ask "Alexa, ask Stellar Lumen to convert 10 lumens." 

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: To test the app just use the intents.
